medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began at 5AM the morning before and has remained dull and constant, described as 'like a bad stomachache.' The patient reports 5 bouts of non-bloody, non-bilious emesis and decreased appetite since the onset of pain. Palpation makes the pain worse and nothing has made it better.
medical_history.family_history: History of kidney stones in great-grandmother and father's cousins.
